mapper.insert: insert into rule (rule_name, rule_work_time, rule_doctor_id) values(#{rule_name}, #{rule_work_time}, #{rule_doctor_id})
mapper.select: select rul.rule_id, rul.rule_name, rul.rule_work_time , doc.doctor_name, department_name from rule rul, doctor_info doc, department_info dep where rul.rule_doctor_id = doc.doctor_id and doc.doctor_department_id = dep.department_id
